resources.string: Opposite Lakhsmi Mandir Cinema, Tonk Road , Jaipur

VEIRA Company has opened its food venture with name OYT Order Your Thali Foods in your city Jaipur. OYT Foods is a pack carry and delivery at your doorstep. OYT serve Vegetarian food only. Ingredients used in preparation are of quality and fresh. Each dish is prepared in small batch to ensure quality food. Packaging is temper proof to avoid chance of tampering during delivery. Serving you fresh delicious food is top most priority. Lunch/Dinner in packed form Thali available for working professionals, corporate offices, meetings, sports meet, travelers , conferences , birthday and kitty parties. Place your order on following numbers. +91-7220872208 +91-7232872329
